title: The Mages' Stones Complete Set
description: All seven of The Mages' Stones short stories together in one edition, with bonus extra content! When their world is threatened by caustic rain with the power to destroy every Mage Stone, two Mages are chosen to defend their way of life.Ceridwen will battle the elements to prevent more damage than the rain has already wreaked. Whilst Stephen, her husband, will confront the evil Mage at the centre of the maelstrom.But when matters are complicated by long-standing friendships, and a series of secrets and lies, it will take a group of powerful allies to deal with the imminent threat facing them. The one they call “Obsidian”.Please note: These short stories are also available separately for those who want to get straight to the action, without the extra insights.
author: India Emerald
